document_data.caption: A map of Silla showing the location of Singye.
document_data.name: E'Tyon Bay
document_data.mainbody:
'''E'Tyon Bay''' was a bay to the north of the city of [[Singye]] in the kingdom of [[Koryo]] in [[Kara-Tur]], lying beside the [[Quang Muku Forest]].

By [[1357 DR]], E'Tyon Bay had become infested by [[tigerworm]]s, which sunk four fishing boats and a merchant ship. Singye authorities offered a reward to any who could eliminate the menace.
